about_the_game:
Play Island Tribe 5 and enjoy the fifth chapter in the amazing hit action series! The island heroes' researcher friend is being held hostage by the Atlanteans after he found a fantastic artefact. Your favourite heroes decide to go to the aid of their friend at the bottom of the sea to save him. Help them out in Island Tribe 5!


- help your favourite island heroes save their friend the researcher from the Atlanteans;
- explore a very detailed underwater world in challenging action levels;
- strategically manage resources, repair farms and totems, and collect diamonds;
- choose between multiple game modes like Easy, Normal, Hard, and Untimed.
